trans-unit.source: !about returns a git tag instead of just 9.9.9 as version for a git checkout. (thx Sven)
trans-unit.target: ！about返回一个git标签，而不是9.9.9.9版本的git checkout。（thx斯文）

trans-unit.source: , unicode hacks, 3to2 reverse hacks all over the place and packaging tricks. But most of all it will finally unite the Errbot ecosystem under one language and open up new possibilities as we refrained from using py3 only features.
trans-unit.target: ，unicode hacks，3to2反向hack以及包装技巧。但是最重​​要的是，它将最终使Errbot生态系统统一为一种语言，并开辟了新的可能性，因为我们避免使用仅py3功能。

trans-unit.source: . Additionally, it is now possible to add your own index(es) to this list as well in case you wish to maintain a private index (special thanks to Sijis Aviles for the initial proof-of-concept implementation).
trans-unit.target: 。此外，现在，如果您希望维护私有索引，也可以将自己的索引添加到此列表中（特别感谢Sijis Aviles进行了初始概念验证实施）。

trans-unit.source: 403 error when fetching plugin repos index (#1425)
trans-unit.target: 获取插件repos索引时出现403错误(#1425)

trans-unit.source: Firebase storage for the Google Firebase DB.
Redis storage (thanks Sijis Aviles!) which uses the Redis in-memory data structure store.
trans-unit.target: 使用Redis内存数据结构存储的Redis存储（感谢Sijis Aviles！）。

trans-unit.source: SQL storage which supports relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres, Redshift etc.
trans-unit.target: 支持关系数据库的SQL存储，例如MySQL，Postgres，Redshift等。

trans-unit.source: A clarification on Errbot’s license has been accepted. The contributors never intended to have the GPL licence be enforced for external plugins. Even if it was not clear it would apply, our new licence exception makes sure it isn’t. Big big thanks for the amazing turnout on this one !
trans-unit.target: 接受Errbot许可证的澄清已被接受。贡献者从未打算为外部插件强制获得GPL许可证。即使不清楚它是否适用，我们的新许可证例外也可以确保它不会适用。非常感谢这一栏的精彩投票！

trans-unit.source: A number of features which had previously been deprecated have now been removed. These include:
trans-unit.target: 一些以前被废弃的功能现在已被删除。这些特点包括:

trans-unit.source: ACLs: We now allow a simple string as an entry with only one element.
trans-unit.target: ACLs。我们现在允许用一个简单的字符串作为条目,只有一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Add Sentry transport support (thx Dylan Page)
trans-unit.target: 增加Sentry运输支持(thx Dylan Page)。
添加重新运行的功能-安全地初始化（＃1390）
在日志中添加管理员警告

trans-unit.source: Add docker support for installing package dependencies (#1245)
trans-unit.target: 增加docker对安装软件包依赖性的支持 (#1245)

trans-unit.source: Add support for cascaded subcommands (cmd_sub1_sub2_sub3) (thx Jeremiah Lowin)
trans-unit.target: 增加对级联子命令(cmd_sub1_sub2_sub3)的支持(thx Jeremiah Lowin)

trans-unit.source: Add support for specifying a custom log formatter (Thx Oz Linden)
trans-unit.target: 增加对指定自定义日志格式的支持(Thx Oz Linden)

trans-unit.source: Added a default parameter to the storage context manager
trans-unit.target: 为存储上下文管理器添加了一个默认参数

trans-unit.source: Added optional room arg to inroom
trans-unit.target: 在 inroom 中添加了可选的 room arg。

trans-unit.source: Adding support for a chat system
trans-unit.target: 增加对聊天系统的支持

trans-unit.source: Adds ability to go back to a previous room
trans-unit.target: 增加了返回上一个房间的功能。

trans-unit.source: Admins are now notified about plugin startup errors which happen during bot startup
trans-unit.target: 管理员现在会收到关于插件启动错误的通知,这些错误发生在机器人启动过程中。

trans-unit.source: After starting Errbot, you should add the bot to your buddy list if you haven’t already. You’ll need to invite the bot explicitly to chatrooms on some chat systems too. You can now send commands directly to the bot!
trans-unit.target: 启动Errbot之后，如果尚未将该机器人添加到好友列表，则应将其添加到您的好友列表中。您还需要明确邀请该漫游器进入某些聊天系统上的聊天室。您现在可以将命令直接发送到机器人了！

trans-unit.source: After the initial installation and security setup, Errbot can be administered by just chatting to the bot (chatops).
trans-unit.target: 在初始安装和安全设置后,Errbot只需与机器人聊天(chatops)即可进行管理。

trans-unit.source: Allow multiline table cells. Thx Ilya Figotin.
trans-unit.target: 允许多行表单元格。Thx Ilya Figotin。

trans-unit.source: As an example, this is all it takes to create a “Hello, world!” plugin for Errbot:
trans-unit.target: 例如，这就是创建“你好，世界！”的全部步骤。Errbot插件：

trans-unit.source: Better resillience on concurrent modifications of the commands structures.
trans-unit.target: 对命令结构的并发修改有更好的弹性。

trans-unit.source: Bye bye Python 2 ! This 4.2 branch will be the last to support Python 2. We will maintain bug fixes on it for at least the end of 2016 so you can transition nicely, but please start now !
trans-unit.target: 再见了 Python 2 ! 这个 4.2 分支将是最后一个支持 Python 2 的分支。我们将至少在2016年底对它进行bug修复,这样你就可以很好地过渡,但请从现在开始 !
回调未处理的消息(thx tamarin)

trans-unit.source: Card emulation support for links (Thx Robin Gloster)
trans-unit.target: 卡片模拟支持链接(Thx Robin Gloster)

trans-unit.source: Cards API: Various backends have a “canned” type of formatted response. We now support that for a better native integration with Slack and Hipchat.
trans-unit.target: Cards API：各种后端都有“固定”类型的格式化响应。现在，我们支持与Slack和Hipchat更好地进行本机集成。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility to API changes introduced in slackclient-1.0.0 (used by the Slack backend).
trans-unit.target: 与 slackclient-1.0.0 中引入的 API 变更(由 Slack 后台使用)兼容。

trans-unit.source: Conversation flows to track conversation states from users.
trans-unit.target: 对话流来追踪用户的对话状态。

trans-unit.source: Conversation flows: Errbot can now keep track of conversations with its users and automate part of the interactions in a state machine manageable from chat. see the flows documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 对话流程：Errbot现在可以跟踪与用户的对话，并在可通过聊天管理的状态机中自动进行部分交互。 有关更多信息，请参见流程文档。

trans-unit.source: Corrected room joining on IRC (Ezequiel Hector Brizuela).
trans-unit.target: 更正了IRC上的房间加入(Ezequiel Hector Brizuela)。

trans-unit.source: Default –init config is now compatible with Text backend requirements.
trans-unit.target: 现在，默认–init config与Text后端要求兼容。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic Plugins API: Errbot has now an official API to build plugins at runtime (on the fly). see the dynamic plugins doc
trans-unit.target: 动态插件API：Errbot现在拥有正式的API，可以在运行时（动态）构建插件。查看动态插件文档

trans-unit.source: Enable split arguments on room_join so you can use ” (thx Robert Honig)
trans-unit.target: 在room_join上启用拆分参数，以便您可以使用”（thx Robert Honig）

trans-unit.source: Encoding error report was inconsistent with the value checked (Thx Steve Jarvis)
trans-unit.target: 编码错误报告与检查的值不一致(Thx Steve Jarvis)

trans-unit.source: Enforce BOT_EXTRA_BACKEND_DIR is a list type. (#1358)
trans-unit.target: 强制执行BOT_EXTRA_BACKEND_DIR是一个列表类型。(#1358)

trans-unit.source: Errbot initial installation. The initial installation has been drastically simplified:
trans-unit.target: Errbot初始安装。初始安装已被大大简化。

trans-unit.source: Errbot is a chatbot designed to be simple to extend with plugins written in Python.
trans-unit.target: Errbot是一个聊天机器人,用Python编写的插件进行简单的扩展。
Errbot是一个聊天机器人。它允许您出于任何原因从聊天室以交互方式启动脚本：随机幽默，chatops，开始构建，监视提交，触发警报…

trans-unit.source: Errbot is available as open-source software and released under the GPL v3 license.
trans-unit.target: Errbot作为开源软件,在GPL v3许可下发布。

trans-unit.source: Errbot runs under Python 3.6+ on Linux, Windows and Mac. For some chatting systems you’ll need a key or a login for your bot to access it.
trans-unit.target: Errbot在Linux，Windows和Mac上的Python 3.6+下运行。对于某些聊天系统，您需要一个密钥或登录名才能让您的漫游器访问它。
在备份命令中导出数值(#1328)

trans-unit.source: Feel free to fork and propose changes on github
trans-unit.target: 随意分叉并在github上提出更改建议

trans-unit.source: File transfert support (send_stream_request) on the Hipchat backend (thx Brad Payne)
trans-unit.target: 在Hipchat后台支持文件转换(send_stream_request)(thx Brad Payne)

trans-unit.source: Fix #1360 Cast pathlib.Path objects to strings for use with sys.path (#1361)
trans-unit.target: 修正 #1360 将pathlib.Path对象转为字符串,供sys.path使用 (#1361)

trans-unit.source: Fix error with Flows missing descriptions (#1405)
trans-unit.target: 修正流程缺少描述的错误(#1405)

trans-unit.source: Fix missing string formatting in “Command not found” output (#1259)
trans-unit.target: 修复“找不到命令”输出中缺少的字符串格式（＃1259）

trans-unit.source: Fix package name for sentry-sdk flask integration
Fix possible event without bot_id (#1073) (thx Roi Dayan)
trans-unit.target: 修正可能出现的没有bot_id的事件 (#1073)(thx Roi Dayan)

trans-unit.source: Fix webhook test to not call fixture directly
trans-unit.target: 修正webhook测试不直接调用夹具的问题。
修正/后台导入错误信息(#1248)

trans-unit.source: Fix: Advanced loop graph does not reflect the image
trans-unit.target: 修复:高级循环图没有反映出图像。

trans-unit.source: Fixed “team_join event handler raised an exception” on Slack.
trans-unit.target: 修复了Slack上的“ team_join事件处理程序引发异常”。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a deprecation warning for 3.9 on Mapping.
trans-unit.target: 修正了3.9中关于Mapping的一个弃用警告。
修正了加入密码保护房间的问题(Mikko Lehto)
修正了在以下情况下,标记符渲染中断的问题

trans-unit.source: Flows can be shared by a room if you build the flow with
trans-unit.target: 流程可以由一个房间共享,如果你建立的流程与

trans-unit.source: For example to keyword search in the public plugin repos you can issue:
trans-unit.target: 例如要在公共插件库中进行关键字搜索,你可以发出:

trans-unit.source: For example: A Message sent from a room will have a RoomOccupant as frm and a Room as to.
trans-unit.target: 例如 从一个房间发送的消息将有一个RoomOccupant作为frm,一个房间作为to。

trans-unit.source: For more general discussion and announcements, you can join us on google plus community. You can also ping us on Twitter with the hashtag
trans-unit.target: 有关更多一般性讨论和公告，您可以加入我们的Google Plus社区。您也可以在Twitter上使用标签对我们进行ping操作

trans-unit.source: For the built-ins, just use one of those options
trans-unit.target: 对于内置,只需使用其中一个选项即可

trans-unit.source: For the external ones (Skype, Gitter, Discord etc …), please follow their respective github pages for instructions.
trans-unit.target: 对于外部的（Skype，Gitter，Discord等），请按照各自的github页面获取说明。
关于标识符更改的更多信息

trans-unit.source: Graphic Test backend: renders way better the chat, TEXT_DEMO_MODE makes it full screen for your presentations.
trans-unit.target: 图文测试后台:渲染效果更好的聊天方式,TEXT_DEMO_MODE让你的演示文稿可以全屏显示。
图形和文本开发/调试控制台

trans-unit.source: Help commands are sorted alphabetically (thx Fabian Chong)
trans-unit.target: 帮助命令是按字母顺序排列的(thx Fabian Chong)

trans-unit.source: Help: don’t add bot prefix to non-prefixed re cmds (#1199) (thx Robin Gloster)
trans-unit.target: 帮助：请勿将漫游器前缀添加到非前缀的re cmds（＃1199）（Thx Robin Gloster）

trans-unit.source: Hipchat: Supports for self-signed server certificates.
Hipchat: fix HicpChat Server XMPP namespace (Thx Antti Palsola)
trans-unit.target: Hipchat:修复HicpChat服务器的XMPP命名空间(Thx Antti Palsola)

trans-unit.source: Hipchat: fix for organizations with more than 100 rooms. (thx Naman Bharadwaj)
trans-unit.target: Hipchat:为超过100个房间的组织修复。(thx Naman Bharadwaj)

trans-unit.source: Hipchat: fix on room occupants (thx Roman Forkosh)
trans-unit.target: Hipchat:修复房间住户(thx Roman Forkosh)

trans-unit.source: Hipchat: fix room str repr. (thx Roman)
Hipchat: fixed a crash on build_identifier
Hipchat: more aggressive cashing of user list to avoid API quota exceeds (thx Roman)
trans-unit.target: Hipchat:更积极的兑现用户名单,避免API配额超标(thx Roman)

trans-unit.source: Hipchat: regression on build_identifier (query for room is not supported)
Hipchat: send_card fix for room name lookup (thx Jason Kincl)
trans-unit.target: Hipchat:send_card修复了房间名称的查找(thx Jason Kincl)。

trans-unit.source: IPv6 configuration support on IRC (Mike Burke)
IRC backend no longer crashes on invalid UTF-8 characters but instead replaces them (mr. Shu).
trans-unit.target: IRC 后台不再因为无效的 UTF-8 字符而崩溃,而是取而代之(舒先生)。

trans-unit.source: IRC backend now cleanly disconnects from IRC servers instead of just cutting the connection.
trans-unit.target: IRC后台现在可以干净利落地断开与IRC服务器的连接,而不是直接切断连接。

trans-unit.source: IRC: Added Notice support (bot can listen to them)
trans-unit.target: IRC。增加了对通知的支持(机器人可以收听)。

trans-unit.source: IRC: Topic change callback fixed. Thx Ezequiel Brizuela.
trans-unit.target: IRC:主题变更回调修复。Thx Ezequiel Brizuela.

trans-unit.source: If all that worked, you can now use the -d (or –daemon) parameter to run it in a detached mode:
trans-unit.target: 如果一切正常，您现在可以使用-d（或–daemon）参数以分离模式运行它：

trans-unit.source: If you just wish to know more about a specific command you can issue:
trans-unit.target: 如果你只是想知道更多关于某个特定命令的信息,你可以发出。

trans-unit.source: In order to configure Errbot to connect to one of those chat systems you’ll need to tweak the
trans-unit.target: 为了将Errbot配置为连接到其中一个聊天系统，您需要调整

trans-unit.source: In-memory storage for tests or ephemeral storage.
trans-unit.target: 内存存储,用于测试或暂存。

trans-unit.source: Installation using wheel distribution on python 3.6 or older
trans-unit.target: 在Python 3.6或更早的版本上使用轮子发行版进行安装。

trans-unit.source: It is written and easily extensible in Python.
trans-unit.target: 它是用Python编写的,并且易于扩展。

trans-unit.source: It will show you a prompt
Load class source in reloading plugins (#1347)
trans-unit.target: 在重装插件中加载类源(#1347)

trans-unit.source: Made the version checker asynchronous, improving startup times.
trans-unit.target: 使版本检查器变得异步,提高了启动时间。
在某个地方做一个目录(这里叫
让聊天室日志更有描述性
让插件名称的冲突具有确定性 (#1282)

trans-unit.source: Makes the timeout feedback better on tests. (#1366)
trans-unit.target: 让测试时的超时反馈更好。(#1366)

trans-unit.source: Many improvements have been made to the documention, both in docstrings internally as well as the user guide on the website at http://errbot.io.
trans-unit.target: 在内部文档字符串以及网站http://errbot.io上的用户指南中，都对该文档进行了许多改进。

trans-unit.source: Message.clone was ignoring partial and flows
trans-unit.target: Message.clone 忽略了部分和流量。

trans-unit.source: Migrate from raven (deprecated) to new sentry-sdk
trans-unit.target: 从 raven(已废弃)迁移到新的 sentry-sdk。

trans-unit.source: More flexible access controls on IRC based on nickmasks (in part thanks to Marcus Carlsson). IRC users, see the new
trans-unit.target: 基于 nickmasks 的 IRC 上更灵活的访问控制(部分感谢 Marcus Carlsson)。IRC用户,请看新的

trans-unit.source: Move all tox environments to use py37 (#1342)
trans-unit.target: 将所有毒素环境移至使用py37(#1342)

trans-unit.source: Moved testing to Tox. We used to use a custom script, this improves a lot the local testing setup etc. (Thx Pedro Rodrigues)
trans-unit.target: 把测试移到了Tox。我们曾经使用一个自定义脚本,这改善了很多本地测试设置等。(Thx Pedro Rodrigues)

trans-unit.source: New entry in config.py: PLUGINS_CALLBACK_ORDER allows you to force a callback order on your installed plugins.
trans-unit.target: 在config.py中新增了一个条目。PLUGINS_CALLBACK_ORDER 允许你对已安装的插件强制执行回调顺序。

trans-unit.source: Not only that but it also install a development directory in there so it now takes only seconds to have an Errbot development environment.
trans-unit.target: 不仅如此,它还在其中安装了一个开发目录,所以现在只需要几秒钟就可以拥有一个Errbot开发环境。

trans-unit.source: Note: even if you changed the BACKEND from the configuration, you can still use
trans-unit.target: 注意:即使你改变了配置中的BACKEND,你仍然可以使用

trans-unit.source: Now if no [python] section is set in the .plug file, we assume Python 3 instead of Python 2.
trans-unit.target: 现在,如果在.plug文件中没有设置[python]部分,我们假设Python 3而不是Python 2。

trans-unit.source: Optionally allow bot configuration from groupchat
trans-unit.target: 可选择允许从群聊中配置机器人。

trans-unit.source: Part of this change, we also made most of the config.py entries with sane defaults, a lot of those settings were not even relevant for most users.
trans-unit.target: 这个变化的一部分,我们也让大部分的config.py条目采用了合理的默认值,很多设置甚至与大多数用户无关。

trans-unit.source: Pass telegram message id to the callback
Person, RoomOccupant and Room are now all equal and can be used as-is to send a message to a person, a person in a Room or a Room itself.
trans-unit.target: Person、RoomOccupant和Room现在都是平等的,可以按原样使用,向一个人、一个Room中的人或一个Room本身发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Plugin Activate was not reporting correctly some errors.
trans-unit.target: 插件激活没有正确报告一些错误.

trans-unit.source: Plugin template was incorrectly showing how to check config. Thx Christian Weiske.
trans-unit.target: 插件模板不正确地显示如何检查配置。Thx Christian Weiske.

trans-unit.source: Plugins which fail to install no longer remain behind, obstructing a new installation attempt
trans-unit.target: 安装失败的插件不再保留,妨碍新的安装尝试。

trans-unit.source: Ported the yield tests to pytest 4.0
Presence.nick is deprecated, simply use presence.identifier.nick instead.
Presetup storage for every plugin i.e.
trans-unit.target: 每一个插件的预设存储,即。
Python 2.7 在 err.py 上出现转换错误。

trans-unit.source: Python 3 has been released 8 years ago, now all the major distributions finally have it available, the ecosystem has moved on too. This was not the case at all when we started to port Errbot to Python 3.
trans-unit.target: Python 3 已经发布了 8 年,现在所有的主要发行版终于都有了它,生态系统也已经向前发展了。当我们开始将Errbot移植到Python 3时,情况完全不是这样。

trans-unit.source: Remove empty “text” body on Slack send_card (#1336)
trans-unit.target: 删除Slack send_card上的空“文本”正文（＃1336）

trans-unit.source: Remove extra spaces in uptime output
trans-unit.target: 删除正常运行时间输出中的额外空格

trans-unit.source: Removed a deprecated dependency for the threadpool, now uses the standard one (thx Muri Nicanor)
trans-unit.target: 删除了线程池的一个过时的依赖,现在使用标准的线程池(thx Muri Nicanor)

trans-unit.source: Reorganization and rename of the startup files. Those were historically the first ones to be created and their meaning drifted over the years. We had err.py, main.py and errBot.py, it was really not clear what were their functions and why one has been violating the python module naming convention for so long :) They are now bootstrap.py (everything about configuring errbot), cli.py (everything about the errbot command line) and finally core.py (everything about the commands, and dispatching etc…).
trans-unit.target: 重新组织和重命名启动文件。从历史上讲，这些是最早创建的，多年来它们的含义在不断变化。我们有err.py，main.py和errBot.py，真的不清楚它们的功能是什么，为什么这么久以来一直违反python模块命名约定:)它们现在是bootstrap.py（关于配置errbot的一切） ），cli.py（有关errbot命令行的所有内容），最后是core.py（有关命令，调度等的所有内容）。

trans-unit.source: Replaced back Bottle and Rocket by Flask
Security: ACL control feature (admin/user rights per command)
trans-unit.target: 安全性。ACL控制功能(每个命令的管理/用户权限)

trans-unit.source: Self-documenting: your docstrings become help automatically
trans-unit.target: 自我文档化:你的docstrings会自动成为帮助。

trans-unit.source: Serve version.json on errbot.io and update version checker plugin (#1400)
trans-unit.target: 在 errbot.io 上提供 version.json 并更新版本检查器插件 (#1400)

trans-unit.source: Set admin check log as debug
trans-unit.target: 将管理员检查日志设置为debug

trans-unit.source: Show user where they are in a flow (thx Elijah Roberts)
trans-unit.target: 显示用户在流程中的位置(thx Elijah Roberts)

trans-unit.source: Slack backend by pinning slackclient to supported version (#1343)
trans-unit.target: 通过将slackclient钉入支持的版本,实现Slack后端(#1343)

trans-unit.source: Slack: Add channelname to Slackroom (thx Davis Garana Pena)
trans-unit.target: Slack。将频道名称添加到Slackroom(thx Davis Garana Pena)

trans-unit.source: Slack: Added reaction support and Message.extras[‘url’] (Thx Tomer Chachamu)
trans-unit.target: 松弛：添加了响应支持和Message.extras ['url']（Thx Tomer Chachamu）

trans-unit.source: Slack: Bot identity is automatically added to BOT_ALT_PREFIXES
trans-unit.target: Slack.Bot身份会自动添加到BOT_ALT_PREFIXES中。Bot身份自动添加到BOT_ALT_PREFIXES中。

trans-unit.source: Slack: Mention callback improvements (Thx Ash Caire)
trans-unit.target: Slack:提到回调的改进(Thx Ash Caire)

trans-unit.source: Slack: Original slack event message is attached to Message (Thx Bryan Shelton)
trans-unit.target: Slack。原有的slack事件消息附在消息中(Thx Bryan Shelton)

trans-unit.source: Slack: Stream (files) uploads are now supported
Slack: Support breaking messages body attachment
trans-unit.target: Slack。支持打断消息正文附件

trans-unit.source: Slack: fix Slack identities to be hashable
trans-unit.target: Slack:将Slack的身份修正为可哈希的身份

trans-unit.source: Slack: fix for some corner case links (Thx Tomer Chachamu)
trans-unit.target: Slack:修复一些角标链接(Thx Tomer Chachamu)。

trans-unit.source: Slack: fix for undefined key ‘username’ when the bot doesn’t have one (thx Octavio Antonelli)
trans-unit.target: 松弛：当机器人没有一个时，修复未定义的密钥“用户名”（thx Octavio Antonelli）

trans-unit.source: Slack: fixed LRU for better performance on large teams
trans-unit.target: Slack:固定LRU,在大型团队中表现更好。

trans-unit.source: Slack: identifier.person now gives its username instead of slack id
trans-unit.target: Slack:identifier.person现在给出了它的用户名,而不是slack id。

trans-unit.source: Slack: no more crash if a message only contains attachments
trans-unit.target: Slack:如果消息只包含附件,就不会再崩溃了。

trans-unit.source: Slack: room joined callback (thx Jeremy Kenyon)
trans-unit.target: Slack:房间加入回调(thx Jeremy Kenyon)

trans-unit.source: Slack: several fixes for identifiers parsing, the backend is fully compliant with Errbot’s contract now (thx Raphael Boidol and Samuel Loretan)
trans-unit.target: 松弛：标识符解析的多个修复程序，后端现在完全符合Errbot的合同（Thra Raphael Boidol和Samuel Loretan）

trans-unit.source: Slack: support for Enterprise Grid (thx Jasper)
Some bundled dependencies have been refactored out into external dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 一些捆绑的依赖关系已经被重构为外部依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Started to add field types to improve type visibility across the codebase
trans-unit.target: 开始添加字段类型,以提高整个代码库的类型可见性。

trans-unit.source: Storage command line interface: It is now possible to provision any persistent setting from the command line. It is helpful if you want to automate end to end the deployment of your chatbot. see provisioning doc
trans-unit.target: 存储命令行界面：现在可以从命令行配置任何持久设置。如果您希望自动化端到端聊天机器人的部署，这将很有帮助。请参阅配置文档

trans-unit.source: Storage is now implemented as a plugin as well, similar to command plugins and backends. This means you can now select different storage implementations or even write your own.
trans-unit.target: 存储现在也作为一个插件来实现,类似于命令插件和后端。这意味着你现在可以选择不同的存储实现,甚至可以编写自己的存储。

trans-unit.source: Support for threaded messages (Slack initially but API is done for other backends to use)
trans-unit.target: 支持线程消息(最初是Slack,但API已完成,可供其他后端使用)。

trans-unit.source: Telegram: send_stream_request support added (thx Alexandre Manhaes Savio)
trans-unit.target: Telegram:send_stream_request support added (thx Alexandre Manhaes Savio)

trans-unit.source: Test backend: stream requests support (thx Thomas Lee)
trans-unit.target: 测试后台:支持流请求(thx Thomas Lee)

trans-unit.source: TestBot: Add multi-line command test support (#1238)
trans-unit.target: TestBot:增加多行命令测试支持(#1238)

trans-unit.source: Tests: use conftest module to specify testbot fixture location (thx Pavel Savchenko)
trans-unit.target: 测试:使用conftest模块来指定testbot夹具的位置(thx Pavel Savchenko)

trans-unit.source: Text backend: readline support (thx Robert Coup)
trans-unit.target: 文本后端:支持读行(thx Robert Coup)

trans-unit.source: Text mode now displays the prompt beneath the log output
trans-unit.target: 文本模式现在会在日志输出下面显示提示。

trans-unit.source: Text/Test: Makes the identifier behave more like a real backend.
trans-unit.target: 文本/测试。使标识符更像一个真正的后台。

trans-unit.source: Text: ACLs were not working (@user vs user inconsistency).
trans-unit.target: 文字。ACLs没有工作(@用户与用户不一致)。

trans-unit.source: Text: BOT_IDENTITY to stay optional in config.py
trans-unit.target: 文字。BOT_IDENTITY在config.py中保留为可选项。

trans-unit.source: Text: autocomplete of command is now supported
trans-unit.target: 文本:现在支持命令的自动完成。

trans-unit.source: Text: fix on build_identifier (thx Pawet Adamcak)
trans-unit.target: 文本:修正 build_identifier (thx Pawet Adamcak)

trans-unit.source: Text: mentions in the Text backend (thx Sijis)
trans-unit.target: 文本:在文本后台提到的(thx Sijis)

trans-unit.source: Text: multiline messages are now supported
trans-unit.target: 文本:现在支持多行信息

trans-unit.source: Text: new TEXT_DEMO_MODE that removes the logs once the chat is started: it is made for presentations / demos.
trans-unit.target: 文本:新的TEXT_DEMO_MODE,一旦聊天开始就会删除日志:它是为演示/演示制作的。

trans-unit.source: Text: now the text backend can emulate an inroom/inperson or asuser/asadmin behavior
trans-unit.target: 文本:现在文本后台可以模拟室内/个人或用户/管理员行为。

trans-unit.source: The ability to apply ACLs to all commands exposed by a plugin (see the updated
trans-unit.target: 能够将ACL应用到插件暴露的所有命令中(见更新的

trans-unit.source: The ability to disable core plugins (such as
The callback order set in the config is not globally respected
trans-unit.target: 配置中设置的回调顺序没有得到全局的尊重。

trans-unit.source: The following storage backends are currently available:

The underlying implementation of Identifiers has been drastically refactored to be more clear and correct. This makes it a lot easier to construct Identifiers and send messages to specific people or rooms.
trans-unit.target: Identifiers的底层实现已经被大幅重构,变得更加清晰和正确。这使得构建Identifiers和向特定的人或房间发送信息变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: The version checker now reports your Python version to be sure to not upgrade Python 2 users to 4.3
trans-unit.target: 版本检查器现在会报告你的Python版本,以确保不将Python 2用户升级到4.3。

trans-unit.source: This is the next major release of errbot with significant changes under the hood.
trans-unit.target: 这是errbot的下一个主要版本,在引擎盖下有重大变化。

trans-unit.source: This means that you can now do things like:
trans-unit.target: 这意味着,你现在可以做这样的事情。
该插件将创建命令“！hello”，该命令发出后将返回“ Hello，world！”。给你。有关您可以使用插件进行的所有操作的更多信息，请参阅《 插件开发指南》。

trans-unit.source: This version work only on Python 3.4+ (see 4.2 announcement)
trans-unit.target: 这个版本只适用于Python 3.4+(见4.2公告)

trans-unit.source: This will clean up a lot of code with ugly
trans-unit.target: 这将用丑陋清理很多代码

trans-unit.source: To get a list of all available commands, you can issue:
trans-unit.target: 要获得所有可用命令的列表,你可以发出。

trans-unit.source: To help you, we have a documented template available here: config-template.py.
trans-unit.target: 为了帮助您，我们在此处提供了一个文档化的模板：config-template.py。

trans-unit.source: To install a plugin from this list, issue:
trans-unit.target: 要从这个列表中安装一个插件,发行。

trans-unit.source: Try out Errbot in text mode
Unit Tests are now all pure py.test instead of a mix of (py.test, nose and unittest)
trans-unit.target: 单元测试现在都是纯py.test,而不是混合使用(py.test、nose和untest)

trans-unit.source: Use python git instead of system git binary (#1296)
trans-unit.target: 使用python git代替系统git二进制 (#1296)

trans-unit.source: Use sys.executable explicitly instead of just ‘pip’ (thx Bruno Oliveira)
trans-unit.target: 显式使用sys.executable而不是仅使用'pip'（thx Bruno Oliveira）

trans-unit.source: Version information is now specified in plugin
trans-unit.target: 版本信息现在在插件中指定

trans-unit.source: Very easy to extend in Python! (see below)
trans-unit.target: 在Python中很容易扩展! (见下文)

trans-unit.source: When a templated cmd crashes, it was crashing in the handling of the error.
trans-unit.target: 当一个模板化的cmd崩溃时,它是在处理错误时崩溃的。

trans-unit.source: Windows: Config directories as raw string (Thx defAnfaenger)
trans-unit.target: Windows:配置目录为原始字符串(Thx defAnfaenger)

trans-unit.source: Windows: Repo Manager first time update (Thx Jake Shadle)
trans-unit.target: Windows.Repo Manager首次更新(Thx Jake Shadle)。Repo Manager首次更新 (Thx Jake Shadle)

trans-unit.source: Writing your own plugins is extremely simple.
trans-unit.target: 编写自己的插件是非常简单的。

trans-unit.source: XHTML-IM output can now be enabled on XMPP again.
trans-unit.target: XHTML-IM输出现在可以再次在XMPP上启用。

trans-unit.source: XMPP: build_identifier can now resolve a Room (it will eventually be available on other backends)
trans-unit.target: XMPP:build_identifier现在可以解析一个Room(它最终将在其他后端可用)

trans-unit.source: XMPP: fix for MUC users with @ in their names (thx Joon Guillen)
trans-unit.target: XMPP:为名字中带有@的MUC用户进行修复(thx Joon Guillen)

trans-unit.source: XMPP: real_jid to get the jid the users logged in (thx Robin Gloster)
trans-unit.target: XMPP:real_jid获取用户登录的jid(thx Robin Gloster)

trans-unit.source: You can administer the bot in a one-on-one chat if your handle is in the BOT_ADMINS list in
trans-unit.target: 如果你的句柄在BOT_ADMINS列表中,你可以在一对一的聊天中管理机器人。

trans-unit.source: You can now use symbolic links for your plugins
trans-unit.target: 你现在可以为你的插件使用符号链接了

trans-unit.source: a bug to report or a feature request, please use our GitHub project page.
trans-unit.target: 要报告的错误或功能请求，请使用我们的GitHub项目页面。

trans-unit.source: a plugin development question please use Stackoverflow with the tags
trans-unit.target: 插件开发问题，请使用带有标签的Stackoverflow

trans-unit.source: a quick question feel free to join us on chat at errbotio/errbot on Gitter.
trans-unit.target: 一个简短的问题随时与我们一起在Gitter上的errbotio / errbot上聊天。

trans-unit.source: admin notifications can be set up to a set of users (thx Sijis Aviles)
trans-unit.target: 管理员通知可以设置为一组用户(thx Sijis Aviles)。

trans-unit.source: allow webhook receivers on / (tx Robin Gloster)
trans-unit.target: 允许webhook接受者在/(tx Robin Gloster)

trans-unit.source: allowing you to make a plugin dependent from another.
trans-unit.target: 允许你从另一个插件中获取依赖性。

trans-unit.source: backup fix : SyntaxError: literal_eval on file with statements (thx Bruno Oliveira)
trans-unit.target: 备份修复:SyntaxError:literal_eval on file with statements (thx Bruno Oliveira)

trans-unit.source: backup: an integrated command !backup creates a full export of persisted data.
trans-unit.target: 备份:集成命令 !backup 创建持久化数据的完整导出。

trans-unit.source: botmatch is now visible from the errbot module (fp to Guillaume Binet)
trans-unit.target: botmatch现在可以在errbot模块中看到了(fp to Guillaume Binet)

trans-unit.source: breaking / API cleanups: - Missed patch for 5.0.0: now the name of a plugin is defined by its name in .plug and not its class name.
trans-unit.target: 突破/API清理。-5.0.0的遗漏补丁:现在插件的名称由.plug中的名称定义,而不是类名。

trans-unit.source: build_identifier to send message to IRC channels (thx mr Shu)
trans-unit.target: build_identifier来发送消息到IRC频道(thx mr Shu)

trans-unit.source: callback on all unknown commands filters
trans-unit.target: 对所有未知命令进行回调过滤

trans-unit.source: card rendering under Slack and Hipchat.
cards are now supported on the graphic backend with a nice rendering (errbot -G)
trans-unit.target: 现在,图形后端支持图形卡,并有一个漂亮的渲染(errbot -G)。

trans-unit.source: cards for hipchat and slack were not merged.
certificate generation was failing under some conditions
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,证书生成失败

trans-unit.source: command are now fetched from a public index and can be queried with
trans-unit.target: 命令现在从公共索引中获取,并可以用

trans-unit.source: configparser needs to be pinned to a 3.5.0b2 beta
configuration helper to allow your plugin to be configured by chat
trans-unit.target: 配置助手,允许您的插件通过聊天来进行配置

trans-unit.source: core: Better error message in case of malformed .plug file
trans-unit.target: core:在出现错误的.plug文件时提供更好的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: core: better support for all the types of virtualenvs (Thx Raphael Wouters)
trans-unit.target: core:更好地支持所有类型的virtualenvs (Thx Raphael Wouters)

trans-unit.source: core: empty lines on plugins requirements.txt does crash errbot anymore
trans-unit.target: core:plugins requirements.txt上的空行会让errbot崩溃。

trans-unit.source: core: excpetion formatting was failing on some plugin load failures.
trans-unit.target: core:excpetion格式化在一些插件加载失败时失效。

trans-unit.source: decorators were working only if kwargs were empty
trans-unit.target: 只有当kwargs为空时,装饰者才会工作。

trans-unit.source: direct the bot to join/leave Multi User Chatrooms (MUC)
trans-unit.target: 指导机器人加入/离开多用户聊天室(MUC)。

trans-unit.source: don’t generate an errbot section if no version is specified in plugin gen (thx Meet Mangukiya)
trans-unit.target: 如果未在插件gen中指定任何版本（thx Meet Mangukiya），则不生成errbot部分

trans-unit.source: errbot/plugin_manager: only check for /proc/1/cgroup if path exists to fix warning
trans-unit.target: errbot/plugin_manager:如果路径存在,只检查/proc/1/cgroup,以修复警告。

trans-unit.source: files instead of in the Python class of the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 文件,而不是插件的Python类中。

trans-unit.source: fix #1375 by managing errors on lack of version endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 修正#1375,管理缺乏版本端点的错误。

trans-unit.source: fix double threading in slack backend if DIVERT_TO_THREAD is used
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了DIVERT_TO_THREAD,修复懈怠后端的双线程。
修复。修正:当出现错误时,记录错误

trans-unit.source: fix: arg_botcmd decorator now can be used as plain method
trans-unit.target: 修正:arg_botcmd装饰器现在可以作为普通方法使用了。

trans-unit.source: fixed imporlib/use pip as process (#835) (thx Raphael Wouters)
trans-unit.target: 修正了imporlib/使用pip作为进程(#835)(thx Raphael Wouters)

trans-unit.source: fixed path to the config template in the startup error message (Thx Ondrej Skopek)
trans-unit.target: 固定了启动错误信息中配置模板的路径(Thx Ondrej Skopek)

trans-unit.source: fixes: - fix crash for SUPPRESS_CMD_NOT_FOUND=True (thx Romuald Texier-Marcadé!)
trans-unit.target: 修复：-修复了SUPPRESS_CMD_NOT_FOUND = True的崩溃（此致RomualdTexier-Marcadé！）

trans-unit.source: flows: New option to disable the next step hint (thx Aviv Laufer)
trans-unit.target: 流程。新增了禁用下一步提示的选项 (thx Aviv Laufer)

trans-unit.source: flows: hint boolean was not forwarded
trans-unit.target: 流量:提示布尔值未被转发。

trans-unit.source: for plugins (not available on all backends).
trans-unit.target: 插件(并非所有后台都可用)。

trans-unit.source: force utf-8 to release changes (thx Robert Krambovitis)
trans-unit.target: 强制utf-8释放变化(thx Robert Krambovitis)。

trans-unit.source: from accidentally sending messages when issuing
from the doctrings only real commands get replaced (thx Raphael Boidol)
trans-unit.target: 从学说上看,只有真正的命令才会被替换(thx Raphael Boidol)。

trans-unit.source: has changed between 3.x and 4.0 On the v3.2 branch, backup can now backup using the new v4 format with
trans-unit.target: 在3.x和4.0之间发生了变化 在v3.2分支上,备份现在可以使用新的v4格式进行备份,并使用

trans-unit.source: if pip is not found, don’t crash errbot
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到pip，请不要使errbot崩溃

trans-unit.source: install/uninstall/update/enable/disable private or public plugins hosted on git
trans-unit.target: 安装/卸载/更新/启用/停用git上的私有或公共插件

trans-unit.source: is now deprecated in favor of
logs can be colorized with drak, light or nocolor as preference.
trans-unit.target: 原木可以根据自己的喜好用drak、light或nocolor着色。

trans-unit.source: logs: can be inspected from chat or streamed to Sentry.
trans-unit.target: 日志:可以从聊天中查看,也可以流传到Sentry。

trans-unit.source: make the TestBot start timeout parameterized
not prefixing the user on regular commands.
trans-unit.target: 不在常规命令中给用户打前缀。

trans-unit.source: now the threadpool is of size 10 by default and added a configuration.
trans-unit.target: 现在线程池默认大小为10,并增加了一个配置。

trans-unit.source: output, more similar to Hubot’s help output (James O’Beirne and Sijis Aviles).
trans-unit.target: 输出，更类似于Hubot的帮助输出（James O'Beirne和Sijis Aviles）。

trans-unit.source: partial boolean to flag partial mesages (thx Meet Mangukiya)
trans-unit.target: 部分布尔值来标记部分邮件(thx Meet Mangukiya)

trans-unit.source: pin markdown <3.0 because safe is deprecated
trans-unit.target: 销钉降价<3.0，因为不建议使用保险柜

trans-unit.source: plugin_manager: skip plugins not in CORE_PLUGIN entirely (thx Dylan Page)
trans-unit.target: plugin_manager:完全跳过不在CORE_PLUGIN中的插件(thx Dylan Page)

trans-unit.source: plugins can be configured from chat
trans-unit.target: 可以通过聊天配置插件

trans-unit.source: polling support: your can setup a plugin to periodically do something
trans-unit.target: 投票支持:你可以设置一个插件,定期做一些事情。

trans-unit.source: pop up the timeout for travis
ported formats and % str ops to f-strings
trans-unit.target: 将格式和 % str ops 移植到 f 字符串上。

trans-unit.source: recurse_check_structure back to public API (thx Alex Sheluchin)
removed (c) Apple asset we completely missed.
trans-unit.target: 删除(三)苹果资产我们完全错过了。

trans-unit.source: removed cross dependencies between PluginManager & RepoManager
trans-unit.target: 删除了PluginManager和RepoManager之间的交叉依赖关系

trans-unit.source: removed deprecated presence attributes (nick and occupant)
trans-unit.target: 删除了过时的存在属性(nick和occupant)。
从消息中删除了过时的类型。
去除旧有的兼容性问题

trans-unit.source: removed the hard dependency on pytest for the Text backend
trans-unit.target: 删除了文本后端对 pytest 的硬性依赖。

trans-unit.source: removing the intermediate domain requiring a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 删除需要证书的中间域。
渲染测试修复(thx Sandeep Shantharam)

trans-unit.source: requirements.txt is now standard (you can use git+https:// for example)
trans-unit.target: requirement.txt现在是标准的(比如你可以使用git+https://)。

trans-unit.source: setup.py cleanup. The hacks in there were incorrect.
trans-unit.target: setup.py清理。里面的黑客是不正确的。

trans-unit.source: slack: Match ACLs for bots on integration ID
trans-unit.target: 怠。为集成ID的机器人匹配ACLs。

trans-unit.source: slack: Process messages from webhook users
trans-unit.target: 怠慢。处理来自webhook用户的信息

trans-unit.source: slack: block on reads on RTM (better response time) (Thx Tomer Chachamu)
trans-unit.target: 松懈:在RTM上阻止读取(更好的响应时间)(Thx Tomer Chachamu)。

trans-unit.source: slack: don’t crash when unable to look up alternate prefix
trans-unit.target: 松弛：无法查找备用前缀时不会崩溃

trans-unit.source: slack: ignore channel_topic messages (thx Mikhail Sobolev)
trans-unit.target: slack:忽略 channel_topic 消息 (thx Mikhail Sobolev)

trans-unit.source: so you can talk to your bot directly! Try
trans-unit.target: 这样你就可以直接和你的机器人对话了! 试试

trans-unit.source: split_string_after: fix empty string handling (thx Robin Gloster)
trans-unit.target: split_string_after:修正空字符串的处理 (thx Robin Gloster)

trans-unit.source: start_poller can now be restricted to a number of execution (thx Marek Suppa)
trans-unit.target: start_poller现在可以限制执行次数(thx Marek Suppa)

trans-unit.source: subcommands and various arg parsing options are available (re, command line type)
trans-unit.target: 子命令和各种arg解析选项可用(re,命令行类型)。

trans-unit.source: supports markdown extras formatting with tables, embedded images, links etc.
trans-unit.target: 支持带有表，嵌入图像，链接等的markdown Extras格式。

trans-unit.source: tar.gz packaged plugins are working again.
trans-unit.target: tar.gz打包后的插件又可以使用了。

trans-unit.source: telegram: ID as strings intead of ints (thx Pmoranga)
trans-unit.target: 电报。ID为字符串,而不是ints(thx Pmoranga)

trans-unit.source: telegram: fix telegram ID test against ACLs
that allows you to change by side effect value without bothering to save value back.
trans-unit.target: 允许你通过副作用值来改变,而不需要费心保存值回来。

trans-unit.source: to make it possible to use with
to test out your instance locally (in text and graphic mode respectively).
trans-unit.target: 来测试你的本地实例(分别在文本和图形模式下)。

trans-unit.source: user friendly message when a room is not found
trans-unit.target: 当找不到房间时,用户友好的信息

trans-unit.source: utils.ValidationException has moved to errbot.ValidationException and is fully part of the API.
trans-unit.target: utils.ValidationException已经转移到errbot.ValidationException中,并完全成为API的一部分。

trans-unit.source: utils.compat_str has been removed, it was a vestige for python 2 too.
trans-unit.target: utils.compat_str已经被删除,这也是python 2的一个遗迹。

trans-unit.source: utils.utf8 has been removed, it was a leftover for python 2 compat.
trans-unit.target: utils.utf8已经被删除,它是python 2 compat的遗留问题。

trans-unit.source: v4 doesn’t migrate plugin repos entries from v3.
trans-unit.target: v4不会从v3迁移插件存储库条目。

trans-unit.source: webhook with no uri but kwargs now work as intended
trans-unit.target: webhook没有uri,但kwargs现在可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: which can create an emply plugin skeleton for you.
trans-unit.target: 它可以为你创建一个emply插件骨架。

trans-unit.source: with pip, you can still do it after the initial installation to add the missing support for example
trans-unit.target: 使用pip,你仍然可以在初始安装后添加缺失的支持,例如

trans-unit.source: you can use as a base.
